TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TranslatorService extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Toolkit.Services.MicrosoftTranslator.ITranslatorService

Docs.summary: The TranslatorService class provides methods to translate text in various supported languages.

remarks.para: To use this library, you must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServices/apitype/TextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key.

Docs.param: A string represeting the text whose language must be detected.
Docs.summary: Detects the language of a text.
Docs.returns: A string containing a two-character Language code for the given text.

remarks.para: This method performs a non-blocking request for language detection.

Public Function InitializeAsync () As Task

Docs.summary: Initializes the class by getting an access token for the service.
Docs.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.

remarks.para: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.
You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

Docs.exception: The provided isn't valid or has expired.

Docs.param: A string representing the text to translate.

A string representing the language code to translate the text into. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method. If the parameter is set to null, the language specified in the property will be used.
Docs.summary: Translates a text string into the specified language.
Docs.returns: A string representing the translated text.

remarks.para: This method perform a non-blocking request for text translation.

list.term: The parameter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or empty.
